title: T206 Frank Smith (Boston and Chicago) Factory 42 Overprint

posts.post_title: T206 Frank Smith (Boston and Chicago) Factory 42 Overprint
posts.post_content:

[IMG]https://static1.squarespace.com/static/584584b9e58c6295c564ee8b/58851f473e00beae85ddc4c3/588a6fe129687fba1d7269bc/1485467627765/030.JPG?format=1000wx[/IMG]

[IMG]https://static1.squarespace.com/static/584584b9e58c6295c564ee8b/58851f473e00beae85ddc4c3/588a6d9e8419c21f2c29c6fb/1485467054871/026.JPG?format=750w[/IMG]

I am trying to put enough scratch together to get a booth at the National Card Show this summer to exhibit my new graded baseball card display frames. I have never been to the National but I am trying to use this new endeavor as an excuse. To that end I will be offering some of my cards for sale through the website. As an added bonus each card will come with a 4Show frame to help you display your old cardboard like a piece of art.

For anyone who might be interested I just posted the following cards:

T206 Frank Smith (Boston and Chicago) SGC 80/6 Factory 42 Overprint
T206 Tris Speaker PSA 2.5
T206 Nap Lajoie (Batting) PSA 4
T206 John Titus SGC 20/1.5

To see additional pictures and pricing please check out our listings:

[url]https://www.4showframes.com/card-shop/[/url]
